entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow in the morning. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
